sentences.sentence: There is no airport in the locality.
We talk of the brain as the locality of thought.
sentences.translation: 我们把进行思维的地方叫做大脑。

sentences.sentence: Following the discovery of the explosives the president cancelled his visit to the locality.
sentences.translation: 发现爆炸物之后总统取消了对该地区的访问。
